attributes.value: Finds introspection to be a waste of time
Finds those that deny their impulses somewhat stiff
Considers craftsmanship to be relatively worthless
Values sacrifice
Values romance
Views the pursuit of knowledge as deeply important
Never feels hatred toward anyone or anything
Is very slow to anger

Is generally quite confident of her abilities when undertaking specific ventures
Is pleased by her own appearance and talents
Likes to present herself boldly, even if it would offend an average sense of modesty
Tends to hang on to grievances
Is absorbed in delusions of self-importance
Is not a private person and freely shares details of her life
Is frustratingly sloppy and careless with every task she sets to carry out
